TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Point3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示 3-D 空間中的 X、Y 和 Z 座標點。

span.span: Represents an x-, y-, and z-coordinate point in 3-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值之間的分隔符號，XAML可以是逗號或空格。In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a can be either a comma or a space. 某些文化特性可以使用逗號字元作為十進位分隔符號，而不是句號字元。Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character. XAML 處理而異的文化特性為 EN-US，在大部分的 XAML 處理器實作中，預設值，並預期為小數分隔符號的期間。XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter. 您應該避免使用逗號字元作為十進位分隔符號，如果指定在 XAML 中，因為會將衝突的字串類型轉換成其元件屬性值。You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a attribute value into its components. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` -or ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *x**x* X 軸座標，這個。The x-coordinate of this . *y**y* Y 軸座標，這個。The y-coordinate of this . *z**z* 這個 z 座標。The z-coordinate of this . ## Examples 此範例示範如何減去結構和結構使用多載的減法 (`-`) 運算子並靜態方法。This example shows how to subtract structures and structures using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and the static method. 下列程式碼說明如何使用減法方法。The following code illustrates how to use the subtraction methods. 首先，結構和結構會具現化。First, the structures and the structures are instantiated. 結構中減去使用多載的減法 (`-`) 運算子，然後他們要使用靜態減去方法。The structures are subtracted using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and then they are subtracted using the static method. 下一步結構減去第一個結構，使用靜態方法，最後結構減去使用多載的減法 (`-`) 運算子。Next, the structure is subtracted from the first structure using the static method, and finally the structure is subtract from the using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator. [!code-csharp[3DGallery_procedural_snip#Subtract3DPointsExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/Misc3DOperationsExample.cs#subtract3dpointsexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業相當於將結構結構具有對應， ，和值。This operation is equivalent to adding a structure to a structure with the corresponding , , and values. 請注意，呼叫方法只會有影響，如果您可以變更， ，和直接內容。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the , , and properties directly. 因為是實值類型，如果您參考物件所使用的屬性或索引子，您會取得一份物件，而不是物件的參考。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果您嘗試變更， ，或上的屬性或索引子的參考，則編譯器會發生錯誤。If you attempt to change , , or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同樣地，呼叫屬性或索引子上不會變更基礎物件。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果您想要變更的值參照為屬性或索引子，會建立新，修改其欄位，然後指派回到屬性或索引子。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何位移結構。The following example shows how to offset a structure.
